author: ahinzmann
body:
Backport of #28480

PR description:

Jet energy resolution data/MC scale factors now come with systematic uncertainties broken up into sources. An example is here:
https://github.com/cms-jet/JRDatabase/blob/master/textFiles/Autumn18_V7b_MC/Autumn18_V7b_MC_SF_AK4PFchs.txt
https://github.com/cms-jet/JRDatabase/blob/master/SQLiteFiles/Autumn18_V7b_MC.db
This PR provides an interface to access these uncertainties via:
float getScaleFactor(const JetParameters& parameters, Variation variation = Variation::NOMINAL, std::string uncertaintySource = "") const;
The condition dataformat is modified, however, the persitent part is untoched, so this code also works on old conditions.
PR validation:

It was checked that all uncertainty sources can be accessed with the new interface with the test file runJERsmearingOnMiniAOD.py.
It was checked that the total uncertainty can be accessed as before in old conditions.

Links to discussion in JetMET:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/864045/#2-updates-on-2018-jer-and-disc
https://indico.cern.ch/event/859946/#5-update-on-jer-scale-factors
title: Jet energy resolution smearing with systematic uncertainties split up [106X backport]
